Name: Avalanche Shot
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
15 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.
Review: Rich, smooth and sticky - peculiarly, this has an almost nutty taste.
Nutrition: One serving of Avalanche Shot contains 123 calories
